StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOso369EvalSignature]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@TrainingFileID uniqueidentifier, @SignatureType int AS
BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
If @SignatureType = 0 -- for RsCo Signature BEGIN SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on WHERE TrainingFileID=@TrainingFileID AND RsCoSignature IS NOT NULL
END ELSE IF @SignatureType = 1 -- for Aop Signature BEGIN SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on WHERE TrainingFileID=@TrainingFileID AND AopSignature IS NOT NULL
END ELSE IF @SignatureType = 2 -- for Oso Signature BEGIN SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCount FROM USMC.Mul.MonthEvalua.on WHERE TrainingFileID=@TrainingFileID AND OsoSignature IS NOT NULL
END
END
